description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Beef & Onion Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow-Cooked Beef & Onion Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheets frozen butter puff pastry, just thawed
2 slow- cooked beef with onion gravy
2 sheets frozen shortcrust pastry, just thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Lightly grease 4 x 2-cup ovenproof pie dishes and line with shortcrust pastry.
Transfer beef and gravy to a bowl and shred beef using 2 forks. Mix cornflour with a little water until smooth and stir into beef. Divide mixture between pastry cases. Brush edges with a little egg.

Cover filling with puff pastry or rough puff pastry, trimming and reserving excess. Press edges to seal. Brush tops with egg. Sprinkle over seeds and decorate using excess pastry, if desired. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden. Serve.
